column4: Bug fixes affecting queryLogEmulator: now emulation is reversible, but may be deliberately obfuscated.  Fixed infinite loop in Markov word generation without EOW symbol.  Fixed some problems with dlsegs option.
Enhancing queryLogEmulator, speeding up sort in corpusPropertyExtractor, and fixing bug in emulateARealCorpus.pl when -dependencies != both.
Adding options to suppress (memory intensive) extraction of dependency properties
